titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of antifriction bearings.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/17/1999--Introduced. Requires the U.S. Customs Service to liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of antifriction bearings made at various ports, in accordance with the final results of the administrative reviews covering specified periods, conducted by the International Trade Administration of the Department of Commerce for such entries.
